parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Airbag Warning Light Illumination and Failure to Deploy
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to a lack of protection in the event of a crash, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The airbag warning light illuminates
the airbag compartment smokes
the airbag does not deploy in a crash
a loud bang is heard
a burning odor is emitted from the airbag.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Parts Distribution Disconnect and Delayed Recall Repair
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of parts for recall repairs can leave vehicles in an unsafe condition, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Notification of recall received
but parts are not available
unable to schedule an appointment for recall repair
manufacturer exceeds a reasonable amount of time for recall repair.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inconvenient and Cost-Prohibitive Recall Repair Process
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The difficulties and costs associated with recall repairs can lead to owners being unable to have the repairs performed, leaving their vehicles in an unsafe condition.
symptoms: Difficulty in finding a dealer or accessing a repair location
high costs associated with transporting the vehicle to a dealer
requests for self-installation of recall parts are denied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the parking brake assembly can cause the brake to suddenly lock up without warning, leading to serious injury or death, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Mild bumping noise when the vehicle is placed into reverse or drive at low speeds
sudden brake lock-up with no warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent loss of braking power can lead to accidents, especially when driving uphill or in heavy traffic, and can cause serious injury or death.
symptoms: Sudden loss of braking power
requiring reapplication of the brakes to regain braking power
occurs randomly and infrequently
often when driving uphill or in moderate weather conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Freezing and Steering Wheel Shaking
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The freezing of brake components can cause the steering wheel to shake violently, making it difficult to control the vehicle, and can lead to accidents, especially in winter driving conditions.
symptoms: Steering wheel shakes violently
tires feel extremely out of balance
occurs when driving in cold weather or after parking in cold temperatures.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the charge air hose can cause the engine to lose power, leading to a loss of speed and potentially causing accidents, especially when driving on highways.
symptoms: A golf-ball-sized hole blows out in the charge air hose
usually in a bend behind the radiator
while driving; the car will idle but throttle up slowly; the engine may stall or lose power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ETM can cause the engine to go into limp mode, resulting in a significant loss of power and speed, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine has a rough idle
the vehicle won't go over 40 mph
the engine goes into limp mode
the check engine light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the throttle control system can cause the vehicle to slow down or lose power, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle slows down to a crawl while driving
the check engine light is illuminated
the engine may stall or lose power.
